tagline: Google Chrome theme featuring the upcoming Microsoft Surface!
name: Surface theme for Chrome!
body:
### Get Surface theme for Chrome!
I've built a simple Surface theme using [ChromeTheme.net](http://www.chrometheme.net/chrome-theme-creator-online.html)!

Here's a screenshot:
![Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/ILI4F.png)

### Download & Contribute

**Download here the latest version:** [to be inserted]

Feel free to make pull request against the repository: [https://github.com/ComFreek/chrome-surface-theme](https://github.com/ComFreek/chrome-surface-theme)


### Author
[@ComFreek](http://twitter.com/comfreek)

Also follow [@Surface-Evangelist](https://twitter.com/SurfEvangelist) on Twitter!

### Additional information
I do not hold any copyright on the used images displaying the Microsoft Surface.
They are from [surface.com](http://www.surface.com).
